===Gráficos===
🔲Atari
🔲140p
🔲Aceitável
🔲Bom
☑️Ótimo
🔲Perfeição
🔲Mais do que perfeito.

===Requisitos===
🔲Qualquer coisa que conduza energia
🔲Uma calculadora com 1 pilha
🔲Um celular
🔲 Um i5 com uma GTX 750TI
☑️No minímo uma GTX 1660
🔲Pc com CPU e GPU muito boas
🔲4xRTX2080TI ligadas numa hidroelétrica

===História===
🔲Historia?
🔲 Historia MEEH
☑️ Uma história legalzinha
🔲Uma história digna de prestar atenção
🔲É sobre a vida real
🔲 Feita pra arrancar lagrimas ( HISTORIA LINDA )
🔲Platão escreveu junto com Machado de Assis e virou novela das 21h.

===Jogabilidade===
🔲Ruim
🔲Aceitável
☑️Jogabilidade bacana
🔲 Jogabilidade excelente

===Complexidade===
🔲Jogos da galinha pintadinha são mais complicados
🔲Fácil de entender
☑️Fácil de aprender, difícil de dominar
🔲É daqueles jogos que as pessoas ficam estudando
🔲Precisa de, no mínimo, 2 doutorados

===Dificuldade===
🔲Você escolhe a dificuldade
🔲Seu cachorro consegue
🔲Da pra zerar dormindo
🔲Fácil
☑️Médio
🔲Dificil
🔲Dark Souls

===Tempo de jogo===
🔲Jogo pequeno
🔲5h
🔲12h
🔲24h
🔲48h
☑️ 100h+
🔲Você começa, seu neto termina

===Áudio, músicas===
🔲Beep
🔲É melhor jogar no mudo
🔲Aceitável
☑️Muito bom
🔲Músicas escritas por Hans Zimmer
🔲Mozart escreveu junto com Beethoven

===Bugs===
🔲Nunca vi nenhum
🔲Pequenos bugs
☑️Pode ficar irritante
🔲Pode estragar a gameplay

===Publico===
🔲 Crianças
☑️ Adolescentes

===Compensa Comprar? ===
🔲IT'S FREE
🔲Preço justo

🔲Mais fácil você queimar seu dinheiro

🔲 P E R F E I T A

=== Pay to win? ===
🔲 Armas coloridas dão um dano consideravelmente maior
☑️ Apenas cosmeticos

Considerações finais
- Irrita pra krl
- 2hrs de fila pra 20 min de partida
- Tem bastante atualização

i like this game but and a big BUT the negatives outperform the positive .
                                                                                                               
                                                                     [h1] NEGATIVES [/h1]

you know that annoying child ( usually your relative ) who keep bothering you and you can't do any thing except waiting for him to return home . 
this game is just like that but this time my friend (( [b] YOU PAID MONEY TO EXPERIENCE THAT [/b] ))

this game have the most toxic community ever.

[b] survivors [/b]
1. experience ( [b] tunneling [/b] ) 
what is tunneling ( the killer keep chasing you and hooking you until you die) its like the killer is a bull and you are the red cape .
-  ( [b] slugging [/b] )
 the killer leaves you on the floor in the dying state and doesn't hook you .
-  ( [b] face camp [/b] )
 the killer stands right in front of you and don't let other survivor help you .
2. ( [b] useless teammates [/b] ) 
you encounter them a lot even in high ranks there is a lot of types
- leave the game (disconnect) when hooked in the beginning of the game 
- waste all the pallets in the map
- keep walking in the corners of the map ( does not fix generator ) or when one generator is remaining
- if one generator is remaining and you and him the last two alive he will hide until you die so he can escape by hatch

[b] killer [/b]
ok killer can't be that bad right . i fear it's worse 
1.( team )
 if you encounter a team . my friend you will experience [spoiler] gang b@ng in a new way [/spoiler]
2.( toxic players )
- complete generator in front of you T-BAG , drop pallet T-BAG ,use flashlight T-BAG , find hatch T-BAG ,
stun you T-BAG ,  exit gate GANG T-BAG .
- when the match over prepare for the open chat .

[b] game problems [/b]

1. some of the more useful perks you get them from licensed survivors and same thing for the killers and
ever licensed character from ( movie or game ) you have to get them with real money .
2. if you want to unlock every character you have to spend 9000 shard to get 9k you have to play for (60h) or more and this is for one character ( you get shard by leveling up ) .
3. the will spend a lot of time in the match making menu ( in the morning it's hard to find killer games and in night it's hard to find survivors )  .
4. you will end up spending more money on the dlcs than the base game .
5. the game hitbox sometimes broken .
6. you will encounter random match or game crashes .

                                                                  [h1] THE POSITIVE  [/h1]                                  

1. you can play as your favorite character from ( movie or game ) .
2. the game have cross play .
3. the only game ( alive ) of it's kind .
4. you have a lot of perks you can try different builds for different experiences  .
5. you can buy it for a very good price with a discount .
6. the game are improving with time .

                                                                     [h1] conclusion [/h1]
if you are irritable this game is not for you .
either than that i advice you to give it a try it's not that expensive and you can refund it if the game is not for you ( you have to play lase than 2h to refund )
i like the game it's a fun but the toxic players ruin the experience 
for me it's a ([b] 7/10 [/b]) game.

[b] have fun and don't be toxic ;-) [/b]

I always defended this game by saying I’d rather play a fun, unbalanced game rather than a boring, balanced one. After spending some time with the broken MMR system, I’ve noticed that it has emphasized how unbalanced the game is and completely removed the fun. Every match is now identical and stressful because everyone feels that they must run the stagnant meta, there is zero variety in gameplay anymore. The current state of the game is terrible, and you shouldn’t expect that to change. 

The studio has been running a monopoly on a niche genre for several years and prioritize selling new DLC over improving old content. They don’t care about the community because they don’t have to.

EDIT: I'm going to leave my original review here for posterity but my opinions on the game have really soured in just a few short months. My critiques in the first paragraph have mostly only gotten worse between even worse bugs and some maps that have been disabled seemingly 4 out of the last 5 months and now a perk that has been disabled less than a day after release because it's utterly broken in that rng can make it literally uncounterable depending on totem spawn locations. Further with the introduction of skill-based matchmaking (in an asymmetrical game with one side being demonstrably stronger than the other) that yes, makes the game easier on beginners but utterly unfun after you hit a certain time investment. Add this to growing issues with hackers that never seem to be dealt with, external controversies with voice lines being removed, characters being removed from purchase, and an entire fiasco involving NFTs and you get a game that has an awesome concept get absolutely ran into the ground because greed. Seriously, save your money and your time and don't make the mistake I did getting sucked into this dumpster fire

                                       ___________________________________

I'm not going to lie to you, this game has problems. It's a buggy mess with every new update fixing one or two glitches but creates three new ones. Certain killers or woefully underpowered, and others are busted between perks and add-ons. You'll as killer encounter swf (survive with friends) groups that will run you around a single pallet until the game is over and teabag in your face at the exit gate. As survivor you will get focused down and tunneled out of the game in the first five minutes. You will deal with toxic entitlement in the end game chat, and yes you will occasionally run into bots and hackers that will break the game wide open. And not to mention the absurdly long grind needed to unlock teachable perks and then earn them on other characters.

All that being said, I love this stupid game.

Some of the bugs are absolutely hilarious, including a current one that can make survivors stuck in a pose that makes them look like they're driving an invisible car. As a killer (even the weaker ones) you will encounter games where everything goes right, you're power works near every time, and you get twelve hooks with only two generators being done. As survivor, you'll eventually figure out how to loop and suddenly you're making amazing plays, taking protection hits, last second dead hards, and flashlight saves; though personally I have yet to figure out timings on flashlight saves, harder than it seems. And sometimes you'll run into the meme-iest playstyles, like trapper that doesn't even go after gens but just traps your items, or survivors that are just trying to summon the crow god by standing in a circle as their heads shake and swivel convulsively. And none of this even takes into account the horror aspect of the game, and playing as michael myers is a blast at times. Even if he's one of the harder killers, just the nostalgia of the chase music on haddonfield can almost make you forget how utterly broken that map is.

This game isn't for everyone, it's not all that competitive because between bugs, lag and rng the game can flip on a dime even if there are folk out there that take it super seriously. It's also somewhat of a repetitive gameplay loop, but if you can see past that to the potential mind games, or you just really want to play a game that just doesn't really have anything else quite like it, maybe give this a shot.
